long_description: Outfitted with a tough steel frame and 3-piece cranks for durability, the Diamondback Grind Pro 20" BMX bike offers everything you need for BMX rides. Steel frame is burly enough to handle consistent, hard riding; down tube gusset adds strength at a critical point. Strong 3-piece tubular chromoly crankset drives a 25-tooth steel chainring to a 9-tooth cassette driver for fast spin-ups. Seatstay-mounted rear U-brake offers a low profile that won't get in the way during tricks. Super-sturdy wheels are built with 48-hole hubs and rims. Diamondback Grind Pro 20" BMX bike has grippy DB Cellblock 2.1 tires to supply good, versatile traction. Specs are subject to change.
short_description: Outfitted with a tough steel frame and 3-piece cranks for durability, the Diamondback Grind Pro 20" BMX bike offers everything you need for BMX rides.
